name: PricingWire
tag_list: monetization, value, value-proposition, revenue-model, pricing, strategy, commerce, payment
overview:
PricingWire is everything related to converting value into revenue and monetizing demand (aka: pricing).

PricingWire is an informative one-stop resource that enables smarter pricing decisions, improves value propositions and optimizes your ability to create and grow paying customers by:

  • provide current and relevant pricing news you can relate to your business

  • point you to key advances and insights - such as studies, articles and stats

  • a resource for you to locate and comment on Pricing Experts and Pricing Software Solutions

  • a collection of information rich books, worthwhile blogs, events and networking opportunities

  • value proposition ratings and reviews of existing companies, products and start-ups

We help you discover, strengthen, communicate and fully leverage your competitive advantage - ultimately positioning your company for the best results - everyday - every transaction.
